title: ** Login User
preconditions: User has a valid username and password
main_flow: User navigates to the login page at  https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
User clicks on the login button
5. If credentials are valid, the system displays a success message and allows the user to access the secure area
6. If credentials are invalid, the system displays an error message
If the user forgets their password, they can click on the "Forgot password?" link to reset their password.
If the user's account is locked due to too many failed login attempts, they will need to wait for a specified amount of time before they can try logging in again.
postconditions: User has successfully logged into the secure area
User can access the features and functions of the secure area
